channel.title: Client Hackers Read This!
channel.description:
We all know this section sucks. We aren't getting no where and everything has been done before. The only time anything exciting happens is when someone from another forums with an advancing client hacking sections posts something here.
This doesn't have to be the case. We could do something about the sorry state we are in but we don't. We have in total one renamed yes one renamed client posted on this forum and it wasn't even very good. We have 2000 tutorials about how to add models and the like but 2 on making interfaces.
Most of you are probably wondering what a renamed client is. Runescape doesnt actually code with anInt108 or whatever they also have renamed but when they compile their client they also Obfuscate it which means they make all the ints etc into an(type)Numberhere. Now renamed clients are clients where someone has tried to UnObfuscate it by changing all of the mentions of an int lets take anInt212 which turns into RequiredValues on a renamed client see its much easier to code with because its in English and things are what they do.
It takes a little getting used to yes but there is so much more you can do did you know that you can have Jframe buttons that only work for certain playerRights? There is a whole world of opportunities out there and all we need to do is grab it.
But we don't because we are Moparscapers. We are the joke of the Private Server Community.
My solution: Whether you like it or not from now on I am going to post Tutorials from other sites (Because I am crappy at writing my own) but only for Renamed clients and I am going to make sure they are interesting ones that you will want to have so you will be forced to switch MUHAHAHAHAHA
Thanks for Reading Tatemo

item.title: Client Hackers Read This!
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

Lol. I can understand Lin saying that. And this is so old now. Go look at the downloads section twerp.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Hackers Read This!
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:4, topic:286432”]Wow. Not progressing at all. What more is there to progress on? Editing the minimap? Scrollbars on an extended inventory? If you think we haven’t advanced, take a look at servers and clients back in 2006 and 2007. Then you tell me what you think.

The reason this section sucks is because the staff sucks. They’re strict and lock everything when they get the chance, which is ruining this community.

Oh and one last thing: Quit trying to act cool when you know nothing. Figuring out how to some extraordinary doesn’t come within time, but effort. I don’t see you putting in any effort but to leech things.[/quote]

Amen.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Hackers Read This!
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

Tatemo:

Loading a 474+ Cache in a 317 client OR Modifying the 474+ Login packet to suit the 317 - 377 servers OR Modifying the 317 - 377 Serverside Login Packet to accept a 474+ Client connection.

Your right with this one, we CAN do it. But every rsps community fails.

overall, this is how the communitys are doing:
Rune-server: Most knowledgeable about interfaces and clients, know a lot of things, but complete cock heads who help nobody.
runelocus: bunch of 10 yr olds. nuff said.
Silabsoft: dead community who seem to mainly focus on client models.
Mopar: full of idiots who just want to leech, but some people who want to learn these things, plus more helpful people.

Tbh, what we need is rune-servers brains and mopars helpfulness.

Read full topic

The reason this section sucks is because the staff sucks. They’re strict and lock everything when they get the chance, which is ruining this community.

We don’t lock anything when we get the chance, we have moderating rules to follow just like other members have regular ones.

item.title: Client Hackers Read This!
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

Lin I can understand that Rune-scape did code on a whole different level but that doesn’t mean we should give up. And r r r I have just been looking through the Project Fubergen Client and there is some amazing Non-renamed coding there and I was just thinking what he could have achieved if he was using renamed.

It seems my number one site for tutorials is down though so I can’t post any at this time.

But I would really love it if Stewie_ posted his renamed client here because that client is a beauty.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Hackers Read This!
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

That’s because most of the smart people here don’t even do stuff with clients. This morning I decided to open up a client and look thought some stuff. It turned out I learned how to move and place object minimap icons (Like a little tree icon), and where they’re loaded. I still have some stuff to figure out, but the point is, it’s hard discovering something even if it is renamed.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Hackers Read This!
item.dc:creator: @r_r_r r r r
item.description:
@r_r_r wrote:

I agree with Tatemo 100%. We haven’t progressed much here at moparscape much at all. Eventually things get here but it takes forever. We need more updates here. Renamed Client’s should be the only ones used, there easier to understand for me. I think most people understand them better as well. Anyway hopefully things start changing around here.

Read full topic
